column5: Enjoyed the premier - it was good to see you with some noteworthy guests... and doing something out of your comfort zone !   Congrats to the Canadian Jr's on a great tourney - tough way to win silver - but well done all the same.

Finally watched the show, recorded it, last night.  Entertaining episode, gotta love musky fishing.  Couple of those "jump shots" were fantastic!! Loved the banter between Dave and Pete As for the hockey, enough has been said about that game.  Let's just say, next year's team will have alot of inspiration to win.  They will also have ALOT of pressure on them not to be the team that makes it three years without gold, and on home soil as well.
Ill be locking this thread for entries at 2pm, and then will make a list of whose eligible.
Pick me, Pick me!!lol
me too
awesome show Dave!! LSC is definately a must do this year!  anytime you want to fish the French, I would be happy to take you out. keep up the great show, looking forward to more episodes.
And the winners are to be announced.   Thanks T.J. and Dave for the awesome contest.  Art

Here the list of entry names I culled from the page, if I missed your entry, please let me know (PM ME) Im gonna do the draw tonight!!  GBW tb4me Mike P bigugli malcolm farsider skinny Cosmos Rod Caster bigmac1984 SRT8 Dan Bouck Dunner Smarty Pantz Mercman fishgreg rippinlipsfishingteam MSBruno Nipfisher Canucker HTHM LucG superdad ColdH2Oguy I'mHooked brifishrgy Bubbles stubbex bucktail alphaalpha Snowball kickingfrog Leechman RobV FRANKIE65 frenchriverkid
Wow, that was ugly. Still a fun game none the less. Can't wait for next year. Proud of our boys.  Never say never
Pete is my stinking hero. What I would give to be taken out with the Musky Ninja...
OH HELL NO!!!!  I can't even think of a way to stop you or offer a retaliation right now.  Too many tears in my beer from hockey...  Hell, I think it's just tears in my glass now...
Enjoyed the musky show and the first two periods. The last one kinda blew....
Great Show! Can't wait for the next.

Isn't a sun screen enough protection from the rays??? You have to go Ninja like too???  The show's format was a change and change is always a good thing, otherwise it becomes a routine.  Nice Boat and the camera is always good.  The cast count was really good- being that the fish of 10,000 casts came better than that.  Cheers  David  aka  Superdad

Sorry to hear the hockey game went poorly at the end.  Glad folks enjoyed the show ... the cast count was a great touch!  Superdad ... yeah, sadly I do need the mask these days. The glare makes me very ill ... too much exposure over the years, apparently, and I've lost my tolerance.

awesome show guys..I kind of liked Dave's little fella'! and his figure 8 wasnt too bad either..I dont usually watch a ton of musky shows so it was a nice change..thanks for doing it!  shame about the juniors..I think the whole country will be talking around the water coolers this morning
Damn...who said 4-2 ? Best 2 periods of hockey I've seen recently! Shame they stopped playing when it counted.  Nice work out there Davie boy, gotta love chasing those predators with the masters!
Great show Dave, LSC has one great fishery, looking forward to the rest of this seasons episodes  as far as the juniors go
I love Musky  I hate Hockey!

Great show Dave!  I have always wanted to try casting for LSC musky, its just i live 2 hours away and trolling always seems to produce, I'll have to try it this summer!  I thought the mask was more of a "stealth" approach Pete    Too bad for our boys, congrats to the ruskies, was a great tourny!!

Thank you all for your kind words and feedback. Shooting this show with Pete and Shram was and absolute blast and an honor. I can't wait to get out with them again and try whoop on some more of those beasts!
but you all need to be wearing the pink hats...
Uh, Dave...This could cost you big. TJ is giving out four (4) prize packs. I know you are generous, but...

Great show.... st Clair has been on my to do list for at least 5 years and watching this reminded me to get it into the rotation of spots for the coming year!  Having Peter Frampton on board is always bonus!!!!
LOL.. umm those 4 prize packs are from me personally and wont be as nice as Daves.... I love you guys... but not that much!! LOL
Was a great show Dave!! When I first started watching I had no idea you guys were catching 'ski's, what a surprise!!!! Always amazing to see those majectic big fish
awww, I almost shed a tear reading that...  I said ALMOST...
Great way to start off the new season!  Very informative and entertaining show.  The question is did Pete eat your honeybun after he caught that 54"er  ?   -Alphaalpha.
I never eat honeybuns ... those things are disgusting, yet they may be better than porkchops for bait. TJ, forgot to comment ... love the pic. Relaxation
I laughed hard on that one "I'd be sitting at the back with a honey bun" LOL great show !!!
Great show Dave and Guests! I have never fished for muskies but after watching your show I am anxious to give it a try. Just have to find a flour sack.  Regards, Snowball
Lawrence of Arabia to pink fuzzy hats, Pete sure is on the cutting edge of fashion.
Certainly was a great show    Congrats Dave and Co Leechman

Wow going to watch Team Canada now but Awesome show Dave!! Pete n shram Know how to catch the monsters thats for sure!! congrats on the 54 incher.. One question..whats with the mask? wind burn is my guess..Or is it just to make ppl like me ask questions?? HA HA HA.. Awesome first show guys! That will be hard to top for the rest of the season..Hey Dave any ice fishing shows in the future?

great show  tonight really liked the intro to the show. great guy met him a couple of times. really interesting that dave didnt do all the talking pete and shram both gave tips on how to fish and what to fish for baits really like the fishing mask might have to pull one out for flyin trip this yr
Dave, PM, and Musky.  Nice.  Now, only 12 more episodes of Musky to come.   (I hope)  Cheers,  Mark

hey love the show on skis. nice Christmas decorations on the end of the line. Man I bet those skis fight hard. Can't wait for the rest of the season. Great show Dave and all the people behind getting it done.
The new show was pretty interested. I really like that fact that show was longer and commercial was much shorter. Really nice addition is gear reviews in the end of the show. Thank you Mr Dave.

Some people are spoiled enough to be able to fish places like Lake St-Clair....I'm spoiled enough to watch them from my couch!!! Good for some chuckles and jealousy after long days at work...thx.  Go Visentin Go!! make Canada proud.

Great show, love that lake.  I fish lake st. clair quite a bit, mostly for Bass, and fish Muskie late fall, but may try in the summer now after seeing the size of some of those.  Having Pete Maina on board definately helps.  Now on to the main event, Canada vs. Russia..... I predict another beating like game 1  Good luck boys
Good job guys I have only seen a few mins so far and it was great can't wait to watch the whole episode I PVRed it.
Great show Dave and Pete!! I think another Maina fashion statement was made!!
Great show Dave, one of the best episodes to date!
great show guys! lots of good tips and info.  ryan

Wow WoW WOW.....that was a totally awesome show Dave!!!! Great job on bringin' in the ski's  Holy smokes that last one that Pete caught was a monster. My daughter heard me going "OMG, OMG" and when she got out of the bath, she came running down to see it LoL.  /me saunters over to her facebook page   Once again, love the show!!!!   █♥█ GO CANADA GO █♥█

Hi,  Happy New Year! So how'd we do? The Ninja  Had a great time with Dave and Schram ... certainly never a dull moment with Dave. I have to say I was very sad though, that I'd forgotten to bring the pink hat. WOuld have been awesome with the Ninja Mask.  Thanks all!

hey Pete !! love the ninja look. Hope to get out for Muskie in the spring with Roy.It'll be my first.Couldnt help noticing Dave has the same gear i just got for christmas.Maybe thats a good omen  Happy new year Pete !!!   Paul

Very cool Paul!   Lucky bugger getting to fish with Roy. I expect those things are all good Omens. My wife Esther just got back from the exercise class she teaches (I know everyone is surprised I wasn't there   ) ... DVR'd the show, so I can brag to her about catching a fish

Great to see two of the best and most knowledgeable fisherman on one show. Was funny to see Dave bugger so much at the beginning, but it was all in good fun. Love to musky show, just wish I had the opportunity to fish St. Clair. I also thought that there was a lot of good tips shared on the show. I always thought that musky being solitary creatures was a bit of  a myth, especially in the summer.

Great show guys it was a blast I sure do love the cast count it shows others that just because you have two great musky fishermen on the boat it still takes a lot of work. After Dave and Ryan get out for some more musky action they will learn that shakers dont count unless the kiddies are on the boat  So Pete when does your version of the show come out with dave taking you out bass fishing you could always add some vampire teeth to the bass before putting them on camera after all vampires are in according to my daughter.  All kidding aside great show cheers
DAMN SKIPPY!!! What a night!  Musky with Dave, Pete and Shram (no teeth marks and I set the hook too - Dave) and Visentin is kicking   in net for Canada.  Is this heaven?
Sorry, didn't catch the show as I don't get WFN.  I really like the previous shows and from the comments here, can't wait to see the replay when we finally get WFN.
someone delete my last post, maybe it will change the outcome and Canada will win the gold...
LOL.. nope were gonna leave it there for ever..... Im gonna see if i can hack in and change your status to that...

Sad to say its over....weeeee suck hahahaha....at least we have Mercer ! hahahaha...good show guys ! Awesome stuff guys !  Pete, get down here to the Niagara river so we can find the next Ontario record lurking around !!
ninjas, muskys, mercer, shram and the maina  lots of tips, great production value  year after year, this show keeps getting better
I wish I had WFN, I guess I wait until the weekend... please don't tell me the score.
The show was like the first 2 periods. AWESOME! The show had a better ending than the game though. Great episode, I dont have a PVR so I'll watch it again on Sunday.

It's like the perfect storm... Dave's season 4 premier at 7:00 on WFN and then the World Junior Championship at 7:30 on TSN A great Wednesday nite of TV!!  Also I have it on good authority that the premier will feature someone we know!! (wink wink)  So this is what were gonna do.. (cause I know ya all love contests..) All ya got to do is post a comment about the show (on this thread after the Show!!) and /or the Juniors and ill pick 4 random winners for a prize pack with some stuff I've got around!! (I'll even wait till after it premiers on the Score Sat at 9am and Sun at 8am.)  Good luck everyone!!
Are Dave and Ryan switching job's for a day?
Guess I'll tune in to see the surprise guest  David  aka  Superdad
I'm getting excited, just saw that tickets to the game are going for over $1,000 if you can find them. (There may also be a Canada - US competition on Daves show as well!!)
Saw a report yesterday stating a site was asking for upto $5k for tics.    Ouch!  BTW, Canada 4 - Russia 2    (in case anyone was wondering)
damn you people and your time machines!

We will be watching for sure!! And for anyone interested WFN is free on the Bell network till the end of the month. So that means you can watch tonight at 7pm if you have bell expressvu. I have to ADD GO CANADA GO!!!!!! Canada 4 Russia 2 take it to the bank!! We will Stomp new holes in thier you know whats...
Very nice boss I cant wait to see it I hope its the musky shoot from LSC.

OK OK I guess I'm starting to look cheap since T.J is putting up all the prizes! So I will add in a $200 lure pack for the lucky winner. All you have to do is post a review of tonight's show and you could win. If you want a second chance to win we will be giving a second $200 lure pack on our facebook fan page as well. So please feel free to enter both.  Good luck and I really hope you guys like this season.  Dave Mercer
My local listings show a pregame show on TSN at 7, then the gold medal game.  you didnt get bumped didja dave??   ryan
Wow .. was only 3-2 last I saw
oooops   i gotta learn to read dave on wfn, hockey on tsn  got it...  ryan
game doesn't start till 7:30 so there is time for both
dan  yeah...i knew the times, but i didnt have the channels right.  i thought the post was saying  both were on tsn at 7 and 730 but i got it allll figgered out now
I had to edit just one word there Dave to I can increase my odds... Geoff
Thanks Dave... you are now the pregame show!!!
T.J. I still bet I'm right with who is the guest...
LSC Musky with Pete and Shram!
Atta Boy you Nailed it! LSC it is.. Mama dont let ur kids grow up to be Muskie fishermen...lol to funny
Hey Dave is that your new Boat? Nice! Lets see how you handle and release those Musky!!
GET THE NET
I would rather that G3 boat over the skeeter any day (well, most days).  This show is great, nice 1st musky (on the show) Dave...

Great show. Nice to see the pros getting some of the same luck as the rest of us shmucks   and they still manage to get some really nice skis. They shoulda been wearing the pink fuzzy hats  Some great tips this episode.
